title: Analyze Mine-to-Market Logistics
description: A logistics planner for a bulk commodity mine (e.g., iron ore) analyzes the entire supply chain from mine to port to identify bottlenecks.

tasks.description: Model the entire logistics chain, including the mine, rail system, and port, with their respective capacities and constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete model of the supply chain is built.

tasks.description: Run a simulation of the model to see how the different components interact.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows that the rail system has sufficient capacity, but the ship loader at the port is the bottleneck.

tasks.description: Recommend a project to upgrade the ship loader to increase its capacity and debottleneck the entire system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A capital project proposal is created to address the system's main constraint.
